articles.description: India's Chief National Coach of badminton, Pullela Gopichand has been put under 14 days quarantine period by the Telangana authorities after his return from Andhra Pradesh in the wake of coronavirus.

articles.title: NBA owners, execs hopeful for return after call with Adam Silver, sources say - ESPN India
articles.description: After a virtual meeting with NBA commissioner Adam Silver, participants on a board of governors call Tuesday left feeling increasingly positive about the league's momentum toward a return to play, sources told ESPN.
articles.content:
Participants on a board of governors call Tuesday with NBA commissioner Adam Silver left the virtual meeting feeling increasingly positive about the league's momentum toward a resumption of play this season, sources told ESPN.

articles.title: Yuvraj Singh questions India batting coach Vikram Rathore's ability to guide T20 players - India Today
articles.description: Talking about his experience of playing for different teams in the Indian Premier League, Yuvraj Singh said he did not enjoy his time at Kings XI Punjab.
articles.content:
Former all-rounder Yuvraj Singh on Tuesday questioned India batting coach Vikram Rathour's ability to guide Indian cricketers in the T20 format.
Rathour had replaced Sanjay Bangar as the batting coach last year.
"He (Rathour) is my friend ... do you think h… [+2743 chars]

articles.description: Mitchell Santner was snapped up by CSK for INR 50 lakh in the IPL 2018 auction. However, due to an injury, the New Zealander did not don CSK jersey in that season.

articles.title: Michael Jordan also dominated the NBA on defense - ESPN India
articles.description: No one scored like Michael Jordan -- but Jordan was just as elite at defending scorers.
articles.content:
IF THERE'S ONE thing that "The Last Dance" has demonstrated, it's that Michael Jordan was nearly impossible to guard. But nearly as impossible was trying to score when Jordan was guarding you.

articles.author: IANS
articles.title: He’s Not That Old: Dhoni’s Mother Reacts to Grey Beard Picture - The Quint
articles.description: Mahendra Singh Dhoni’s mother reacted to the latest photo of the cricketer that has been doing the rounds on social media. Dhoni’s image went viral when a video was uploaded on his daughter Ziva’s Instagram handle.
